meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Hugh McElaney Diane Taubold Craig Campbell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1063.

div.div: The players were introduced already standing in position.

td.p: Hugh McElaney, a U.S. Air Force contract negotiator from Upton, Massachusetts
Diane Taubold, a manager from Rochester, New York
Craig Campbell, an advertising executive from Victorville, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $25,999)

tr.td: FAMOUS QUOTES
SINGERS
AMERICAN AUTHORS
RUBBER
BALLS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'All five of his children were delegates to the 1988 Republican convention')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: All five of his children were delegates to the 1988 Republican convention

(including 3 DDs),
2 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
